akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1871. State laws and regulations This chapter is intended to supplement State law, and compliance with this chapter shall not excuse any person from compliance with appropriate State law and regulation. (Pub. L. 97–470, title V, § 521, Jan. 14, 1983, 96 Stat. 2599.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective 90 days from Jan. 14, 1983, see section 524 of Pub. L. 97–470, set out as a note under section 1801 of this title.
